item.title: Maximum Energy Minimum Emissions - ADNOC
item.description: We are making today’s energy cleaner, while investing in the clean energies of tomorrow. With sustainability at its core, our lower carbon solutions are delivering maximum energy with minimum emissions, as we help progress a responsible and realistic energy transition.

item.title: ADNOC Wallet | Customer Service Portal
item.description: ADNOC Wallet login. Select your account type: Individual/Beneficiary. Register your Individual Wallet Now!

item.title: Careers at ADNOC Group | ADNOC Group jobs
item.description: Explore Your Future. We give you the tools you need to discover your perfect job match, and the freedom and support to take your career to the next level.

item.title: Abu Dhabi National Oil Company - Wikipedia
item.description: Website. www .adnoc .ae. The Abu Dhabi National Oil Company ( Arabic: شركة بترول أبو ظبي الوطنية ), known by its acronym ADNOC, is the state-owned oil company of the United Arab Emirates (UAE). It is the world's 12th largest oil company by production. [2]

item.title: Consumer - ADNOC Distribution
item.description: ADNOC Distribution produces and blends top-grade lubricants at our state-of-the-art facilities in Abu Dhabi to the highest international standards from world-renowned murban crude oil. We offer a wide range of premium products across automotive, industrial, marine and speciality.

item.title: ADNOC Announces Comprehensive 2030 Sustainability Goals as it Extends ...
item.description: As part of its sustainability goals, ADNOC plans to decrease its greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions intensity by 25 percent by 2030, strengthening its position as one of the least carbon-intensive oil and gas companies in the world.

item.title: Who We Are - ADNOC - Abu Dhabi National Oil Company
item.description: Founded in 1971, ADNOC is a leading diversified energy group, wholly owned by the Abu Dhabi Government. Our network of fully integrated businesses operates across the energy value chain, helping us to responsibly meet the demands of an ever-changing energy market.

item.title: ADNOC Group | LinkedIn
item.description: At ADNOC, we’re accelerating deployment of AI and digital technologies from the board room to the control room – shaping and enhancing our approach to efficiency, sustainability and safety.

item.title: ADNOC Drilling - Drilling
item.description: At the core of the Abu Dhabi National Oil Company’s (ADNOC) upstream activities and the sole provider of drilling rig services in the Emirate of Abu Dhabi, ADNOC Drilling is the strategic enabler of ADNOC Group’s current and future oil and gas production programs.

item.title: ADNOC Supplier Hub - Abu Dhabi National Oil Company
item.description: Enabling suppliers to go beyond procurement. Our all-in-ADNOC platform delivers end-to-end solutions for streamlined management across procurement, legal, health and safety, finance, and more.
